definition: structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished

sentences.english: To me, in the love of the river, I often feel like I was upstream .
sentences.chinese: 於我，在愛情的河流裏，我經常覺得自己在逆流而上。

sentences.english: I think he thought, If Michael can do it, I can do it.
sentences.chinese: 我想他是覺得如果邁克爾能做到，他也能做到。

sentences.english: Do you think it's possible for me to change to a single room with a bath?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得我有可能換到一間有衛浴設備的單人房嗎？

sentences.english: She was embarrassed when they kept telling her she had a genius for mathematics.
sentences.chinese: 他們總是對她說她有數學蠢才，她覺得很不好心思。

sentences.english: The whole shebang smells sort of fishy to me.
sentences.chinese: 整個事情使我覺得有點蹊蹺。

sentences.english: It was fine at first; most of my friends had moved home too.
sentences.chinese: 起初我覺得還好，我的很多朋友也都回家投靠父母了。

sentences.english: I am shy and find social situations stressful.
sentences.chinese: 我很怕羞，覺得社會場合有壓力。

sentences.english: What do you think about Union Square?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得聯合廣場怎麼樣？

sentences.english: This will help on days that you don’t feel like cooking.
sentences.chinese: 這樣每天下來你就不會覺得自己在煮飯了。

sentences.english: In a funny way, it was the last day at Highbury.
sentences.chinese: 在海布里的最後一天，這多少讓人覺得有點不舒服。

sentences.english: I have chills and a headache.
I felt it useless for us to say anything further.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得我們再說下去也沒有用。

sentences.english: Do you think it's worth paying so much for designer products?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得爲設計師的產品花那麼多錢值得嗎？

sentences.english: High I feel that I do most of the one thing that is out of the literary agency.
sentences.chinese: 高二我覺得我做的最對的一件事就是退出了文學社。

sentences.english: I think we should go into the cave.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得我們還是回到那個山洞。

sentences.english: I'm sure he'd really like me.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得他肯定會喜歡我的。

definition: to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else

that one/that thing/that (as opposed to this)/(used before a verb or adjective for emphasis)/(used to humorously or indirectly refer to sth embarrassing, funny etc, or when one can't think of the right word)/(used in speech as a filler, similar to "umm", "you know" etc)/(euph.) menstruation/sex/also pr. [nei4 ge5]
